976c869d-8cb0-5bb6-97fd-1bfc8882146e.name: Adaptive
976c869d-8cb0-5bb6-97fd-1bfc8882146e.description: Once per battle, after being attacked, changes the Temtem's second type to the type of the received technique and gets SPATK.

6b62cf84-d21f-50ae-9a93-aade3975d829.name: Aerobic
6b62cf84-d21f-50ae-9a93-aade3975d829.description: After attacking with a Wind technique, gets SPDEF and SPD.

5471fd4f-f136-5a55-afcf-8aa60834e571.name: Aggressor

dc97ebbd-b907-52b4-be5e-8cb0afc5034f.name: Air Specialist

538e423a-3f73-5c52-8a30-13ef2ba5e77f.description: After being attacked with a Water technique, gets SPD and ATK.

baffebf0-6365-56ea-a3fd-772995510d9b.name: Anaerobic

d9da48d3-011c-5d27-8f2e-73bf73a5c366.description: After attacking with a special technique, the target gets poisoned for 1 turn if it's a rival or regenerating for 1 turn if it's an ally or itself.

9481f441-bc94-5657-956a-043608581ed2.name: Arcane Wrap
9481f441-bc94-5657-956a-043608581ed2.description: Damage taken from special techniques is reduced by 20%.

6a739557-dec1-5d8a-85ba-ed65cd482c03.name: Autotomy
6a739557-dec1-5d8a-85ba-ed65cd482c03.description: Once per battle, when entering the battlefield, gets evading for 2 turns.

fb6f1e7b-2bf8-5492-9caa-bffdbdd6ba7c.description: When an ally is knocked-out, gets SPATK and SPD.

e8d348f4-0665-5de9-b486-41ff718c3316.name: Burglar

2b6f3a2f-cd3a-532c-907e-9c33a29d2291.name: Camouflage
2b6f3a2f-cd3a-532c-907e-9c33a29d2291.description: When attacked with a physical technique, gets evading for 2 turns.

0f878595-f965-5e60-9383-5bbc4cfb3cae.name: Channeler
0f878595-f965-5e60-9383-5bbc4cfb3cae.description: Damage done with special techniques is increased by 25%.

2de28107-2c55-581c-9d96-de10ba259ce0.description: When poisoning or attacking a poisoned Temtem, the target also gets trapped for 2 turns.

a168a72a-ff29-5bb8-9580-65592b8afe47.name: Cold-Blooded

4e032b09-9af4-53c8-a6e8-4c81a40cf1b4.description: Instead of getting cold, the Temtem gets frozen.

5a7a7c1c-e8c2-55c6-a514-8318ff2e05f7.description: When damaged by a technique, damage done to the attacker is increased by 32% during the same turn.

985e7cc7-789d-587b-881f-e66a6f291d08.name: Confident
985e7cc7-789d-587b-881f-e66a6f291d08.description: When using an effective or super effective technique, gets SPD.

2f6ce720-602a-5fb4-800c-869bac802ae0.name: Confined
2f6ce720-602a-5fb4-800c-869bac802ae0.description: When getting an trapped status condition, gets DEF and SPDEF if the attacker is itself.

5a63f431-fe19-56c8-b677-e08d85325fa8.name: Contagious
5a63f431-fe19-56c8-b677-e08d85325fa8.description: When a rival exits the battlefield, they get poisoned for 1 turn.

84421313-a89b-52ea-afa8-b084e7cb7a1c.description: Once per battle, when resting, gets ATK and SPD.

8da67475-baad-5635-ad65-722fee1a1eb6.description: When attacking with a physical technique, the target gets seized for 3 turns.

ca98f5e9-885d-5f47-8991-6b8450e9e16a.name: Demoralize
ca98f5e9-885d-5f47-8991-6b8450e9e16a.description: When entering the battlefield, rivals get SPD.

17a12a5e-18ce-59a4-8a7b-3643a7c6217f.description: When a rival exits the battlefield, they get DEF and SPDEF.

a1dc6c03-5965-5f13-b130-3f26dee1d0c3.description: When a rival rests, they lose 25% of max HP.

698fd679-3c69-502e-bce1-3ed680a00ce6.description: After attacking with a Earth technique, gets DEF.

cd1c42f1-c3f4-509a-8903-28da905fdc38.description: Damage taken from effective techniques is reduced by 30%.

502c8adf-2809-5c93-ba71-2d332477dbbd.name: Efficient
502c8adf-2809-5c93-ba71-2d332477dbbd.description: When attacking, STA cost is reduced by 30%.

a8382c00-3faa-5ec4-befd-83b0c701c5da.description: Electric techniques targeting the ally will target the Temtem instead and deal 15% less damage.

ca6f52ab-b65a-5f3d-ab24-56ababb4bed4.name: Electric Synthesize
ca6f52ab-b65a-5f3d-ab24-56ababb4bed4.description: When attacked with an Electric technique, restores HP instead of receiving damage.

bcbb4efd-8e81-521b-a13d-19ea454e95bd.name: Energized

5703df73-a925-5dd9-b53c-a8e55631d48b.name: Energy Reserves
5703df73-a925-5dd9-b53c-a8e55631d48b.description: Once per battle, if the Temtem is attacked and HP is below 40%, gets ATK and invigorated for 2 turns.

6be48479-7968-5239-8a97-4a046454ec52.name: Enraged
6be48479-7968-5239-8a97-4a046454ec52.description: While HP is below 30%, damage done is increased by 30%.

c2e2086b-9019-5007-af07-8094adfc6b9d.name: Fainted Curse
c2e2086b-9019-5007-af07-8094adfc6b9d.description: When knocked-out, the attacker loses 30% of max HP.

55f386f6-0aea-53e8-9de8-c2124cc57156.name: Fever Rush
55f386f6-0aea-53e8-9de8-c2124cc57156.description: When getting a status condition, gets ATK.

cbb1317c-6c72-5d61-bb96-e91b99e2d4c2.name: Final Stand
cbb1317c-6c72-5d61-bb96-e91b99e2d4c2.description: At the start of the turn, while HP is below 30%, gets DEF and SPDEF.

6a4b84e3-02f9-5f88-b9c1-3b090da5ad09.description: Damage taken from Mental, Toxic, or Electric techniques is increased by 50%.

024fb509-6283-5dc3-ac0a-2adc39590e3f.description: Gears from the rival and the ally don't have any effect during the first 5 turns the Temtem is on the battlefield.

7751e415-1aa4-51be-a42b-ece637d9dd79.name: Furor
7751e415-1aa4-51be-a42b-ece637d9dd79.description: When HP is below 33%, techniques do 33% more damage.

2bf35e8c-a253-5999-ba7a-dc247521cd25.name: Going Away Gift
2bf35e8c-a253-5999-ba7a-dc247521cd25.description: When knocked-out, adds the Temtem positive stat stage changes to the ally.

03caf0d4-220d-56f4-a9fd-78dfeadca7a7.name: Good Friend

e142fe68-29c2-5b09-8d63-bc0a4375065a.name: Gotta Go Fast

8b317e30-9c98-5741-a0c6-ec81593e5ef0.description: Prevents negative stat stage changes and the cold, Frozen, burned, poisoned, and doomed status conditions on the ally.

e2be944f-5146-5560-b66d-bd18f4b9f1f5.description: Damage taken from Earth techniques is reduced by 50%.

e014a8d1-fd8b-5d74-a934-7d48d3aba0c1.description: When entering the battlefield, the Temtem gets -1 Hold.

7c1ec933-0e8c-5e51-bdcc-1afba0bf6b7b.description: Damage done with Water techniques is increased by 15%.

f05c7c9f-72a8-50ef-9abc-1cd33df212ac.description: When another Temtem is knocked-out, gets evading for 1 turn.

96dc4b5a-6887-51f8-ac2f-af31e33cccfa.name: Immunity

fb4908df-94b7-5286-82d8-60e0e4fabdbf.name: Inductor

905f0d07-7594-5ebd-9433-1e0d912760af.description: Traits from the rivals and the ally don't have any effect during the first 5 turns the Temtem is on the battlefield.

b1ba5679-7cbb-5f34-99bc-18fe55ba71f3.description: Type resistances for the Temtem are reversed.

ad877b37-ef32-52bd-bea2-5a8dbc06dc1a.name: Kinetic Transfer
ad877b37-ef32-52bd-bea2-5a8dbc06dc1a.description: When attacked, restores 10% of max STA and the attacker loses 10% of max STA.

8438abcb-e8e6-536c-88b0-ce733300b68f.description: When entering the battlefield, Mimit transforms into the next Temtem in clockwise order.

ebe0e162-f545-58db-96dd-cfe2d50eb5e0.name: Last Rush
ebe0e162-f545-58db-96dd-cfe2d50eb5e0.description: While rivals outnumber allies, techniques inflict +40% Damage.

d4214ddc-6080-54a7-86f2-f06992e4b512.name: Loneliness

d42042b4-1f4e-5604-8d45-fe2a0d33a685.name: Marathonist
d42042b4-1f4e-5604-8d45-fe2a0d33a685.description: When attacking, gets SPD, and STA cost is reduced by 50%.

1f25b66b-b2bb-5f91-8a52-ac8071c5cd34.description: When resting, heals all negative status conditions, and gets regenerating for 1 turn.

c0e8a92d-b42f-5172-9352-cb07effe843b.name: Mental Alliance
c0e8a92d-b42f-5172-9352-cb07effe843b.description: Increases SPATK by 15% if ally is Mental.

962471dc-d84f-5b04-85e8-e928b110ed36.name: Mineral Crusher
962471dc-d84f-5b04-85e8-e928b110ed36.description: Damage done to Earth or Crystal Temtem is increased by 25%.

b15373ca-d4c2-5ea0-8454-9d830c3d36b9.name: Mirroring
b15373ca-d4c2-5ea0-8454-9d830c3d36b9.description: When attacked with a Special technique, the attacker gets 25% knockback damage.

dfb79304-45fa-5f89-ae8a-6545dc4d5231.description: Prevents the poisoned status condition and reduces damage taken from Toxic Techniques by 20%.

a5aa3a3b-e21e-51fb-8dc1-1b950bac6feb.name: Motivator

b4a1d9e7-d8aa-5482-97aa-68a64b85809e.description: Instead of applying poison, the target gets doomed for 4 turns instead.

cb2290e3-3331-56fc-91a5-9f317ed2e92b.name: Parrier
cb2290e3-3331-56fc-91a5-9f317ed2e92b.description: Damage taken from physical techniques is reduced by 20%.

819a8ec2-d48d-5a3b-8f7d-1aa5fe6676f6.description: Restores 15% of max STA when using a Hold technique.

ad5d6c97-dd74-55a2-a738-02ca56115568.description: Damage done with physical techniques is increased by 50%.

8702c0e8-90b5-56ea-8036-fc6a5a3ca2c9.description: When attacking, type resistances for the target Temtem are reversed.

5f1884aa-3dc8-5bb5-b8be-e1de57f6cdd8.description: Increases SPD by 30% while HP is over 70%.

70f53a22-dead-5616-8214-e296fa5ece96.name: Power Nap

3885a4cf-b5b8-5fb9-b224-91f1009bf66a.name: Prideful
3885a4cf-b5b8-5fb9-b224-91f1009bf66a.description: When attacking, gets ATK, SPATK and SPD if the target gets knocked-out.

4af7f1cf-a987-505d-a2e1-9b11b734648d.description: When an ally is damaged by an Electric, Mental, or Fire technique, damage is reduced by 20%.

2ade1b3f-b719-50b0-86c6-9fac79a6ccac.name: Protector

e649cc61-0cd2-5dbe-be0d-17e7f75da9f3.name: Provident
e649cc61-0cd2-5dbe-be0d-17e7f75da9f3.description: After being attacked with a Fire, Earth or Melee technique, gets SPDEF.

4c3c7045-0f42-53f3-af28-0696766179b3.name: Punch Bag
4c3c7045-0f42-53f3-af28-0696766179b3.description: Damage taken from Melee techniques is reduced by 30%.

e2b9f637-2508-5f7a-887a-82c08c0222e1.name: Puppet Master
e2b9f637-2508-5f7a-887a-82c08c0222e1.description: While HP is below 40%, received rival techniques get redirected to the ally.

00a876e3-5747-534c-a484-0b766064e2e0.name: Pyromaniac
00a876e3-5747-534c-a484-0b766064e2e0.description: Damage done with Fire techniques is increased by 15%.

ef5b2701-68a6-58ad-8f79-691d07aff832.name: Receptive
ef5b2701-68a6-58ad-8f79-691d07aff832.description: When getting a favorable status condition, increases its turns by 1.

6f09948d-1564-5ff0-9940-bdc6812ec95a.name: Refurbished
6f09948d-1564-5ff0-9940-bdc6812ec95a.description: Once per battle, regenerating for 4 turns after 3 consecutive turns on the battlefield.

40e2a780-9735-5041-8b6e-1531d83ddc12.name: Rejuvenate
40e2a780-9735-5041-8b6e-1531d83ddc12.description: After attacking with a special technique, restores 8% of max HP.

c64f32ec-98f8-53bb-a51a-1f006639bb5c.name: Relaxed
c64f32ec-98f8-53bb-a51a-1f006639bb5c.description: Restores 15% of max HP after not receiving any rival attacks during the turn.

50d28ef4-ad42-5fd7-aede-e620dc33a098.name: Resilient
50d28ef4-ad42-5fd7-aede-e620dc33a098.description: Once per battle, when knocked-out due to overexertion, prevents getting knocked-out, removes the overexertion turn penalization and gets SPD.

0afa3171-1dee-5668-9c23-c55cab068019.name: Resistant
0afa3171-1dee-5668-9c23-c55cab068019.description: When getting a negative status condition, decreases its turns by 1.

1099cc8e-df92-584d-9608-adaf7fb011a6.name: Rested
1099cc8e-df92-584d-9608-adaf7fb011a6.description: Increases ATK and SPATK by 30% during the first 2 turns the Temtem is on the battlefield.

5710d24a-e77e-576a-a75b-893dc019c9c1.name: Royal Jelly
5710d24a-e77e-576a-a75b-893dc019c9c1.description: At the start of the turn, allies restore 5% of max HP.

a0b832a7-1baf-544d-a9cd-3956e1f523e0.name: Ruminant
a0b832a7-1baf-544d-a9cd-3956e1f523e0.description: When attacking a Nature Temtem rival, gets regenerating for 2 turns.

03fbd3c0-a4c2-52cc-a4b3-0ac73942e1fb.name: Rusher
03fbd3c0-a4c2-52cc-a4b3-0ac73942e1fb.description: When the Temtem exits the battlefield, gets SPD, and when a rival enters the battlefield, gets SPD.

5243e456-e6c9-5eb1-ba77-c1c70f3af2b9.name: Scavenger
5243e456-e6c9-5eb1-ba77-c1c70f3af2b9.description: Restores 17% of max HP if another Temtem is knocked-out.

8445b48e-7de9-5774-a284-902bd5cd1a15.name: Seismic
8445b48e-7de9-5774-a284-902bd5cd1a15.description: When entering the battlefield, rivals lose 7% of their max HP. This effect cannot knock out Temtem.

3db939b7-d868-5240-aab4-85bf4506f77e.name: Self-Care
3db939b7-d868-5240-aab4-85bf4506f77e.description: When attacked with a physical or special technique, gets regenerating for 1 turn.

e37dc546-8001-5731-afe5-0ba1efd876bb.name: Self-Esteem
e37dc546-8001-5731-afe5-0ba1efd876bb.description: When attacking, removes all negative status conditions if the target gets knocked-out.

73d1c820-fe9b-51fa-b88e-53f33f5ba04b.name: Sensei
73d1c820-fe9b-51fa-b88e-53f33f5ba04b.description: When attacking with a Physical technique, uses SPATK, and when attacking with a Special technique, uses the ATK.

c4d7b70b-1564-525d-8a0b-6a8b18bc911e.name: Sentinel
c4d7b70b-1564-525d-8a0b-6a8b18bc911e.description: When entering the battlefield, removes the asleep status condition on the ally and prevents the asleep status condition on the ally and itself.

ba16b12f-d5ad-5461-ace3-93cc386fe426.name: Seppuku
ba16b12f-d5ad-5461-ace3-93cc386fe426.description: When attacking and being knocked-out due to overexertion, the target gets doomed for 2 turns.

4c59f6f3-bd5f-581e-a286-a728aa6b304b.name: Settling
4c59f6f3-bd5f-581e-a286-a728aa6b304b.description: Increases ATK by 8% for each turn the Temtem stays on the battlefield.

e3322862-6d3c-57cc-bedf-4041d8a9d983.name: Shaolin
e3322862-6d3c-57cc-bedf-4041d8a9d983.description: Damage done with special techniques is increased by 10%.

a27bfbe9-75a7-5066-a13c-76ebcc0e6387.name: Shared Pain
a27bfbe9-75a7-5066-a13c-76ebcc0e6387.description: After receiving a rival attack, the next one during the same turn gets redirected to the ally.

939a5228-4ce5-562b-935a-1ba29d0f9fbd.name: Short Circuit
939a5228-4ce5-562b-935a-1ba29d0f9fbd.description: Prevents all stat changes on all Temtem.

f758aaa3-cad1-58e1-9b3c-169d7689d0d0.name: Skull Helmet
f758aaa3-cad1-58e1-9b3c-169d7689d0d0.description: Damage taken from Mental or Melee techniques is reduced by 25%.

d762cc24-c5ed-593d-bff5-7f8054843e1c.name: Snowstorm
d762cc24-c5ed-593d-bff5-7f8054843e1c.description: Once per battle, when entering the battlefield, rivals and the ally get cold for 3 turns if they aren't cold already.

4ef9af7a-6d07-561e-89dc-e1b88fa3ed08.name: Soft Touch
4ef9af7a-6d07-561e-89dc-e1b88fa3ed08.description: When attacking an asleep target, damage done is increased by 20% and the target won't wake up.

26e8d101-132d-52a7-930b-6eebceb4d5e2.name: Solidifier
26e8d101-132d-52a7-930b-6eebceb4d5e2.description: When attacking with a Water Special technique, uses the ATK.

4d83f8be-235a-518a-b268-aec132ff8a7b.name: Source Replicator
4d83f8be-235a-518a-b268-aec132ff8a7b.description: When getting a positive status condition, adds the change to the ally too.

08307818-50ac-57f9-b746-72bd2ef33606.name: Specgulp
08307818-50ac-57f9-b746-72bd2ef33606.description: When attacked with a special technique, restores 8% of max HP.

162d97b3-2683-592d-8f13-84065c2df922.name: Specmaster
162d97b3-2683-592d-8f13-84065c2df922.description: Damage done with special techniques is increased by 50%

fdf3bfd6-57c0-5c0b-b08e-9b7d9b109f93.name: Spiritual
fdf3bfd6-57c0-5c0b-b08e-9b7d9b109f93.description: When entering the battlefield, gets SPATK and SPDEF.

02063bc9-7ac7-5060-af0b-24c77641cdd1.name: Splitter
02063bc9-7ac7-5060-af0b-24c77641cdd1.description: When attacked with a physical or special technique, prevents all negative status conditions.

1b7fee0e-ee00-5187-8668-2d2530f12cc7.name: Spoilsport
1b7fee0e-ee00-5187-8668-2d2530f12cc7.description: Damage done with multi-target techniques is increased by 25%.

567db2c8-5045-512c-be9c-3410839b08ef.name: Spreader
567db2c8-5045-512c-be9c-3410839b08ef.description: If there are multiple rivals, single-target special techniques become multi-target and damage done with them is reduced by 20%.

43772317-64f1-5965-8018-b1dafa93ba3a.name: Stabmaster
43772317-64f1-5965-8018-b1dafa93ba3a.description: Damage done with matching type techniques is increased by 40%.

b3c6f8b8-3fc3-5269-b215-bac0da781434.name: Striking Transmog
b3c6f8b8-3fc3-5269-b215-bac0da781434.description: When attacking an individual Temtem with a physical technique, Mimit transforms into the target.

a307e74d-c503-5835-b24f-01f6b1121429.name: Strong Liver
a307e74d-c503-5835-b24f-01f6b1121429.description: When attacked with a Toxic technique, restores HP instead of receiving damage.

545b0c15-3f90-5dff-a581-034a42010f77.name: Superconductivity
545b0c15-3f90-5dff-a581-034a42010f77.description: When an ally uses a technique, the temtem counts as all types for its synergy.

8f671b83-2275-51b5-b187-661a308a9bf1.name: Synergy Adept
8f671b83-2275-51b5-b187-661a308a9bf1.description: Damage done with synergy techniques is increased by 15% while the Temtem participate in the synergy.

55a7f91a-497b-51e8-b32c-fac82671599f.name: Synergy Master
55a7f91a-497b-51e8-b32c-fac82671599f.description: Damage done with synergy techniques is increased by 25% while the Temtem participate in the synergy.

38808c41-3493-5ca9-90b9-a6c77f876fc2.name: Synertyper
38808c41-3493-5ca9-90b9-a6c77f876fc2.description: Damage done with techniques is increased by 30% if both allies share a type.

b449af4f-cf93-5cc2-ae97-c04ef23d6f33.name: Tactical Strike
b449af4f-cf93-5cc2-ae97-c04ef23d6f33.description: Damage done with Hold techniques is increased by 20%.

9dbf4b1e-9d2a-57c4-8f50-4a67bdac05ee.name: Tag Team
9dbf4b1e-9d2a-57c4-8f50-4a67bdac05ee.description: Damage taken from techniques is reduced by 15% if both allies share a type.

d6fc5771-92fb-5471-822d-2394a24db6e0.name: Tardy Rush
d6fc5771-92fb-5471-822d-2394a24db6e0.description: Increases SPD by 85% and ATK by 10% after 3 consecutive turns on the battlefield.

8a98a022-b315-571e-8305-4c690ad4f558.name: Target Replicator
8a98a022-b315-571e-8305-4c690ad4f558.description: When the ally gets a positive status condition, adds the change to the Temtem too.

4d0ac03b-8d3d-5cd7-af49-64e262737144.name: Thick Skin
4d0ac03b-8d3d-5cd7-af49-64e262737144.description: Damage taken by Wind techniques is reduced by 50%.

a5b94826-70f4-5d3d-ac91-8faba1570696.name: Tireless
a5b94826-70f4-5d3d-ac91-8faba1570696.description: When overexerted, prevents the turn penalization and gets ATK.

8d1e8bf2-416e-563a-8647-a40f6221ae13.name: Toxic Affinity
8d1e8bf2-416e-563a-8647-a40f6221ae13.description: Toxic techniques get type damage boost.

69d4c58b-485a-581f-bb5f-9e9c278b0149.name: Toxic Farewell
69d4c58b-485a-581f-bb5f-9e9c278b0149.description: When knocked-out, the attacker loses 10% of max HP and gets poisoned for 3 turns.

e9cf583b-e9f3-5208-947b-580304c26f7c.name: Toxic Skin
e9cf583b-e9f3-5208-947b-580304c26f7c.description: After being attacked with a physical technique, the attacker gets poisoned for 2 turns.

4558e5f7-c572-56e1-88c8-dc910e845499.name: Toxin Crusher
4558e5f7-c572-56e1-88c8-dc910e845499.description: Damage done to Toxic Temtem is increased by 50%.

383d3e8a-8c21-5f88-bc69-ea901e5200be.name: Trance
383d3e8a-8c21-5f88-bc69-ea901e5200be.description: Once per battle, if the Temtem is attacked and HP is below 30%, gets asleep for 2 turns and regenerating for 3 turns, SPATK and SPDEF.

533e82cc-ddfb-5a15-9f20-f85529ffb1b6.name: Trauma
533e82cc-ddfb-5a15-9f20-f85529ffb1b6.description: After being attacked if hit by a Physical technique gets DEF; if hit by a Special technique, SPDEF.

30fb926c-3a7e-501c-b7b3-8be9f7184163.name: Tri-Apothecary
30fb926c-3a7e-501c-b7b3-8be9f7184163.description: After attacking with a special technique, the target gets poisoned for 3 turns if it's a rival or regenerating for 3 turns if it's an ally or itself.

d496f8cc-6890-5f47-a643-d1ac9299ff5d.name: Unnoticed
d496f8cc-6890-5f47-a643-d1ac9299ff5d.description: Gets SPD after not receiving any rival attacks during the turn.

1b0d7e56-136c-5717-98e7-2bbf9bb5e922.name: Vigorous
1b0d7e56-136c-5717-98e7-2bbf9bb5e922.description: Damage done when overexerting is increased by 50%.

4ebaa509-dbe0-55e2-940b-4611ab957cd4.name: Viral Combustion
4ebaa509-dbe0-55e2-940b-4611ab957cd4.description: When getting a poison status condition, the attacker gets burned for 4 turns.

1f5e6dda-719d-5160-9dce-20261f12220b.name: Voltaic Charge
1f5e6dda-719d-5160-9dce-20261f12220b.description: When attacked with a single-target technique, the attacker gets 10% knockback damage.

e6c72caf-9522-52b4-b98c-4c8b19684bc4.name: Voodoo
e6c72caf-9522-52b4-b98c-4c8b19684bc4.description: When attacking an ally, 75% of the damage is replicated to each rival.

60896f2f-ea1a-5819-b7b8-be14de0de431.name: Warm Gift
60896f2f-ea1a-5819-b7b8-be14de0de431.description: When a rival exits the battlefield, they get burned for 3 turns.

c6160a81-d5db-5fca-8477-36caa1b4ea3c.name: Warm-Blooded
c6160a81-d5db-5fca-8477-36caa1b4ea3c.description: Prevents the Cold and Frozen status condition.

d7d08230-4465-5859-ac83-ade60ec5fe0f.name: Water Affinity
d7d08230-4465-5859-ac83-ade60ec5fe0f.description: Water techniques get type damage boost.

7a2cd26c-dda4-5ceb-a2bf-847fc7295761.name: Water Custodian
7a2cd26c-dda4-5ceb-a2bf-847fc7295761.description: Water techniques targeting the ally will target the Temtem instead and deal 15% less damage.

1b55b83b-8842-57b8-aa58-13b6240fed9c.name: Water Synthesizer
1b55b83b-8842-57b8-aa58-13b6240fed9c.description: When attacked with a Water technique, restores HP instead of receiving damage.

eb8d5070-c5f8-587d-982f-1eb2616ee0a1.name: Wax Bath
eb8d5070-c5f8-587d-982f-1eb2616ee0a1.description: When an ally rests, they get SPDEF.

948091c3-730b-5830-80d1-18f18e708d28.name: Welcomer
948091c3-730b-5830-80d1-18f18e708d28.description: Once per battle, when an ally enters the battlefield, the ally gets evading for 1 turn.

8859f892-d306-5b58-a3c6-1a2200cbcff0.name: Withdrawal
8859f892-d306-5b58-a3c6-1a2200cbcff0.description: When resting, restores 20% of max HP and removes asleep and poisoned status conditions.

1dd3f396-c5ca-54e8-b2d0-fa78b2fc7708.name: Wrecked Farewell
1dd3f396-c5ca-54e8-b2d0-fa78b2fc7708.description: When self knocked-out, rivals lose 25% of max HP.

88923273-612e-50ae-8a50-3ff1b8becaae.name: Zen
88923273-612e-50ae-8a50-3ff1b8becaae.description: When getting an asleep status condition, gets DEF and SPDEF.
